How to Create Logisland Documentation

This guide describes the asciidoc format and conventions that the Logisland has adopted.

References

The following links provide background on the general conventions and Asciidoc syntax.

  • AsciiDoc Mark-up Quick Reference for Documentation

  • Asciidoctor User Manual

  • AsciiDoc Syntax Quick Reference

Variables for Use in Documents

The following variables externalize key information that can change over time, and so references to such information should be done by using the variable inside of {} curly brackets. The complete list of externalized variables for use is given in the following table:

Table 1. Variables
Property Name Value Description

{project-name}

Logisland

The official name of the project.

{logisland-version}

1.1.2

The current version of the project.

{logisland-home-url}

https://logisland.io

The location of the project home page.

{logisland-site-getting-started}

/get-started

The location of the getting started page.

{logisland-site-live-coding}

{logisland-site-live-coding}

The location of the live coding page.

{logisland-site-extension-authors-guide}

/guides/extension-authors-guide

The location of the extension authors guide page.

{logisland-org-url}

https://github.com/hurence

The location of the project github organization.

{logisland-base-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland

Logisland GitHub URL common base prefix.

{logisland-clone-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland.git

Logisland URL for git clone referenced by the documentation.

{logisland-archive-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland/archive/master.zip

Logisland URL to master source archive.

{logisland-blob-url}

{logisland-blob-url}

Logisland URL to master blob source tree; used for referencing source files.

{logisland-tree-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland/tree/master

Logisland URL to master source tree root; used for referencing directories.

{logisland-issues-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland/issues

Logisland URL to the issues page.

{logisland-images-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland-images/tree

Logisland URL to set of container images delivered for Logisland.

{logisland-chat-url}

https://gitter.im/logisland/logisland

URL of our chat.

{logisland-mailing-list-subscription-email}

logisland-dev+subscribe@googlegroups.com

Email used to subscribe to our mailing list.

{logisland-mailing-list-index}

https://groups.google.com/d/forum/logisland-dev

Mailing list index page.

{quickstarts-base-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland-quickstarts

Quickstarts URL common base prefix.

{quickstarts-clone-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland-quickstarts.git

Quickstarts URL for git clone referenced by the documentation.

{quickstarts-archive-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland-quickstarts/archive/master.zip

Quickstarts URL to master source archive.

{quickstarts-blob-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland-quickstarts/blob/master

Quickstarts URL to master blob source tree; used for referencing source files.

{quickstarts-tree-url}

https://github.com/hurence/logisland-quickstarts/tree/master

Quickstarts URL to master source tree root; used for referencing directories.

{graalvm-version}

{graalvm-version}

Recommended Graal VM version to use.

Logisland is open. Logisland and its extensions are available under the Apache Software License 2.0 or compatible license.
